name: Vlad the Nightborn
aura: Increase Ally C. RATE in Arena battles by 30

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Decreases the target’s MAX HP by 30% of the damage inflicted. Also heals this Champion by 30% of the damage inflicted.
skills.name: Thirsting Blade
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Leech] debuff for 2 turns.

Also has a 75% chance of stealing 50% of the Turn Meter from Champions from the Bannerlord, Sacred Order, or High Elf Factions. Has a 75% chance of decreasing the Turn Meter by 50% instead against targets not from those Factions.
skills.name: Exsanguinate
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. The first hit has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. The second hit has a 75% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 2 turns. 

If both debuffs are placed, places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
skills.name: Mind Shroud
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc:
Places a [Revive On Death] buff on this Champion for 2 turns every time this Champion kills an enemy. 

Also fully heals this Champion and fills their Turn Meter by 50% every time they kill an enemy. 

[Will only heal and fill this Champion’s Turn Meter when Konstantin the Dayborn is on the same team.]
skills.name: Notorious [P]
